name: Adept for Dominion
description:
Dominion Adept picks a Kingdom deck for your games of Dominion. It includes the entire range of expansions and promos, including the newest release, Nocturne and the 2nd Edition cards for the base set and Intrigue.

Dominion Adept follows the designer's rules for picking kingdoms, including the Young Witch's Bane card, Dark Ages' many special cards, and landscape cards. It also provides a convenient list of all additional cards and components necessary to set up your generated kingdom.

You can alter the picking rules by selecting specific expansions to pick from, by limiting the expansions picked for a given kingdom, by following or not following Alchemy, Prosperity, and Dark Ages picking rules, and by requiring a Reaction card whenever an Attack card is picked.

If you find a kingdom you particularly enjoy, you can save it.

Don't like a particular card in a kingdom? Replace it or—if you don't want to ever see the card again—ban it. (Sorry, Saboteur.)

Or, if you'd rather start by picking some or all cards in a kingdom yourself, use the card picker to build it.

Dominion Adept is a Kingdom deck randomizer for Donald X. Vaccarino's Dominion, but does not allow you to play Dominion itself and is not affiliated with or approved by Donald X. Vaccarino, Rio Grande Games, or any other publisher.
